content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <rdf:RDF   xmlns:dcterms="http://purl.org/dc/terms/"   xmlns:documentcontainer="http://eidchub.ceh.ac.uk/portal_types/documentContainer#"   xmlns:file="http://eidchub.ceh.ac.uk/portal_types/File#"   xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" >   <file:File rdf:about="http://eidchub.ceh.ac.uk/metadata/37a503da-d75c-4d72-8e8b-b11c2fdc7d92/supporting-documents-for-gm-farm-scale-data">     <dcterms:modified rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#dateTime">2012-02-23T15:35:40Z</dcterms:modified>     <dcterms:creator>clamw</dcterms:creator>     <file:id xml:lang="en">supporting-documents-for-gm-farm-scale-data</file:id>     <dcterms:description xml:lang="en">Supporting documents for GM Farm Scale data</dcterms:description>     <dcterms:isPartOf>       <documentcontainer:documentContainer rdf:about="http://eidchub.ceh.ac.uk/metadata/37a503da-d75c-4d72-8e8b-b11c2fdc7d92">         <dcterms:issued rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#dateTime">2012-02-27T10:10:00Z</dcterms:issued>         <documentcontainer:id xml:lang="en">37a503da-d75c-4d72-8e8b-b11c2fdc7d92</documentcontainer:id>         <dcterms:modified rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#dateTime">2013-06-03T08:49:26Z</dcterms:modified>         <dcterms:creator>clamw</dcterms:creator>         <documentcontainer:catalogLink>http://data.ceh.ac.uk/metadata/37a503da-d75c-4d72-8e8b-b11c2fdc7d92</documentcontainer:catalogLink>         <dcterms:description xml:lang="en">This dataset consists of a range of ecological measurements collected from a set of arable fields, each sown with a combination of genetically modified and conventional winter-sown oilseed rape crops. Measurements include species counts in the following areas: weed seedbank, vegetation in the crop, field edge vegetation, invertebrates. The data were collected as part of the Farm Scale Evaluations (FSEs), a four-year programme of research by independent researchers aimed at studying the effect that the management practices associated with Genetically Modified Herbicide Tolerant (GMHT) crops might have on farmland wildlife, when compared with weed control used with non-GM crops. Data were collected by a consortium of: the Institute of Terrestrial Ecology, ITE (now the Centre for Ecology and Hydrology, CEH), the Institute of Arable Crop Research (now Rothamstead Research, IACR) and the Scottish Crop Research Institute, SCRI (now the James Hutton Institute, JHI). Data were collected for four crops overall (Beet, Maize, Spring-sown Oilseed Rape and Winter-sown oilseed Rape).</dcterms:description>         <dcterms:isPartOf rdf:resource="http://eidchub.ceh.ac.uk/metadata"/>         <dcterms:subject>seedbank</dcterms:subject>         <dcterms:subject>trophic interactions</dcterms:subject>         <dcterms:subject>agro-ecology</dcterms:subject>         <dcterms:subject>CEH Project C01732</dcterms:subject>         <dcterms:subject>soil</dcterms:subject>         <dcterms:subject>sugar beet</dcterms:subject>         <dcterms:subject>environmental impact</dcterms:subject>         <dcterms:subject>CEH Biodiversity Programme</dcterms:subject>         <dcterms:subject>Species distribution</dcterms:subject>         <dcterms:subject>weeds</dcterms:subject>         <dcterms:subject>arable</dcterms:subject>         <dcterms:subject>NERC_DDC</dcterms:subject>         <dcterms:subject>arable farming</dcterms:subject>         <dcterms:subject>vegetation</dcterms:subject>         <dcterms:subject>invertebrates</dcterms:subject>         <dcterms:subject>oilseed rape</dcterms:subject>         <dcterms:subject>maize</dcterms:subject>         <dcterms:subject>biodiversity</dcterms:subject>         <dcterms:subject>functional groups</dcterms:subject>         <dcterms:subject>Britain</dcterms:subject>         <dcterms:subject>crops</dcterms:subject>         <dcterms:subject>genetically modified herbicide-tolerant crops</dcterms:subject>         <documentcontainer:fileIdentifier xml:lang="en">37a503da-d75c-4d72-8e8b-b11c2fdc7d92</documentcontainer:fileIdentifier>         <dcterms:created rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#dateTime">2012-02-23T14:21:25Z</dcterms:created>         <dcterms:hasPart rdf:resource="http://eidchub.ceh.ac.uk/metadata/37a503da-d75c-4d72-8e8b-b11c2fdc7d92/supporting-documents-for-gm-farm-scale-data"/>         <dcterms:title xml:lang="en">Farm scale evaluations of herbicide tolerant genetically modified crops - winter oilseed rape</dcterms:title>       </documentcontainer:documentContainer>     </dcterms:isPartOf>     <dcterms:created rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#dateTime">2012-02-23T15:35:40Z</dcterms:created>     <dcterms:title xml:lang="en">Supporting documents for GM Farm Scale data</dcterms:title>   </file:File> </rdf:RDF>
